title: Abstract Composition II
description: A vibrant exploration of geometric forms and color relationships, featuring bold primary colors arranged in dynamic compositions that challenge traditional spatial perspectives.
provenance: Created specifically for testing purposes in the Sample Museum collection.

curator_notes.content: This piece demonstrates the interplay between geometric abstraction and color theory, showcasing how simple shapes can create complex visual narratives.
The digital medium allows for precise color gradients and sharp geometric boundaries that would be difficult to achieve with traditional media.
